name: Doctor Away
description:
In the apple kingdom there was peace...

But that peace was shattered when the doctors came. The apple people were in peril...

Until a brave warrior stepped forward to protect them.

This warrior went to the hospital, the heart of the enemy's territory.

And so the warrior's mission began: to keep the doctor away.

This was my first time making a game and pixel art. I had a lot o fun making it but it's still incomplete. So far there's only one level, but I will add more in the future. Any feedback is appreciated 😊

Credits:

Music:

The only one at the party by Flowerhead - https://flowerheads.bandcamp.com/
